name: raycast-arc-extension
title: Arc Workspace Switcher
author: vesa
description: Raycast extension to configure shortcuts for switching Arc browser workspaces to pre defined tab or pin.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

commands.name: open-mapped
commands.title: Open Workspace Tab
commands.subtitle: Use configured Arc workspace-tab mappings
commands.description: Search your configured mappings (alias, workspace, tab) and open the target in Arc.

commands.name: open-by-alias
commands.title: Open by Alias
commands.subtitle: Type an alias to open
commands.description: Quick open: type a configured alias to switch Arc workspace and tab.

commands.name: manage-arc-shortcuts
commands.title: Manage Arc Shortcuts
commands.subtitle: Add, edit, or delete shortcuts
commands.description: Manage your Arc workspace-tab shortcuts using Raycast UI. Add, edit, delete, import, and export shortcuts.

preferences.name: use_ui_scripting
preferences.title: Use UI Scripting
preferences.description: Enable UI scripting with System Events to switch Arc workspace via menu. Requires Accessibility permission for Raycast.

preferences.name: tab_modifier_key
preferences.title: Tab Selection Modifier
preferences.description: Modifier key for tab selection shortcuts (e.g., 'command' for Cmd+Number).
